title: Scorecard: Best Attribute Bonanza Round 1.
body:
**Preface**

Overall I think the game worked out quite well and we can use this template in the future for future rounds of the Best Attribute Bonanza game. One thing I don't think we will do again is the Attribute/GDer combination. I felt like it would be too easy to use the game as a sniping platform to antagonize and the purpose of the game is to have some fun and be creative and imaginative and then be appreciated for making an original point.

Kind of like how Around the Horn works on ESPN, except instead of just the Host arbitrarily granting points or mutes, everyone gets to.

Nothing truly nasty happened in our first go round, but I see potential for it and as such all future rounds of Best Attribute Bonanza will use a more mundane combination like Attribute/Champion, or Attribute/Movie. I expect those with an extensive knowledge of pop culture will be quite good at the game, and there are a million Things we can describe with an Attribute, so the game should always stay somewhat fresh because the topics will always be slightly different.

It's now GD's version of a  game of competitive banter. Let's get to the game stats.

**Game Awards**

Champion: nm1010 (an award given to the winner, career wins record holder is Champion of Champions)

Vanquished: GlobDaBlob (an award given to the loser, career losses record holder is Most Vanquished)

Top Competitor: Latitoast (a career award for the most games played. As everyone is tied I have arbitrarily named our first Top Competitor for the dedication to competing in the event)

Flawless: CTElephant, Dragontroopbeta, HappyHonker, Purple Ayane, Burger and Fries (a game award given to all Competitors who score positively without a single downvote, career Flawless record holder is Most Flawless)

Top Comment: Throwing Rocks - 13 (an award given to the top non-Submission comment. A Competitor or Fan may win Top Comment. Career Top Comment record holder based on score of the comment is Top Commentor)

**Face Time**

As Champion of Best Attribute Bonanza, you, nm1010, are now entitled to some Face Time. Take a second to tell us all what's on your mind in one short paragraph, there are no rules, boast, brag, thank your mom, short speech about flowers, personal anecdote, w/e. The Face Time is all yours. Please start the Face Time post with " **Face Time** " to let us know you are partaking of your Champion's right.

**What's next?**

We can do round 2 today at some point if people want. Let me hear your opinion on whether or not we should do Attribute/Champion or Attribute/Movie for the Round 2 and we will do the other for Round 3. Thanks for playing folks, hope everyone has a blast.
